00035         Stem::Stem( Parameters* params, Stem* parent ) {
00036                 if( !params )
00037                         throw Exception( Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "Parameters *params == NULL", "Stem::Stem" );
00038 
00039                 mParameters = params;
00040                 mParent = parent;
00041                 mNumSubStems = 0;
00042                 mNumLeaves = 0;
00043                 mNumFronds = 0;
00044                 mNumVertices = 0;
00045                 mNumTriangles = 0;
00046                 mLength = 1.0f;
00047                 mRadius = 1.0f;
00048                 mOffset = 0.0f;
00049                 mIsRoot = false;
00050                 mIsGrown = false;
00051         }
00052 
00053         Stem::~Stem() {
00054                 std::vector< Section* >::iterator i;
00055                 for( i = mSections.begin(); i != mSections.end(); ++i ) {
00056                         delete *i;
00057                 }
00058                 mSections.clear();
00059 
00060                 std::list< Stem* >::iterator j;
00061                 for( j = mSubStems.begin(); j != mSubStems.end(); ++j ) {
00062                         delete *j;
00063                 }
00064                 mSubStems.clear();
00065         }
00066 
00067         void Stem::grow( const Quaternion& orientation, const Vector3& origin, float radius, float length, float offset, unsigned char level ) {
00068                 if( level >= mParameters->getNumLevels() && !mIsRoot )
00069                         return;
00070 
00071                 if( mParameters->getCurveRes( level ) == 0 )
00072                         return;
00073                 
00074                 mOrigin = origin;
00075                 mOrientation = orientation;
00076 
00077                 // Locals used
00078                 Vector3 localSectionOrigin = Vector3::ZERO;
00079                 Vector3 step = Vector3::ZERO;
00080                 Vector3 currentOrigin = mOrigin;
00081                 Quaternion localOrientation = mOrientation;
00082                 Quaternion newLocalOrientation = mOrientation;
00083                 Section* section = 0;
00084                 float sectionRadius = radius;
00085                 float y = 0.0f;
00086                 float angle = 0.0f;
00087                 float treeScale = mParameters->getScale() + getRandom( mParameters->getScaleV() );
00088                 float trunkLength = treeScale * ( mParameters->getLength( 0 ) + getRandom( mParameters->getLengthV( 0 ) ) );
00089                 float baseLength = mParameters->getBaseSize() * treeScale;
00090 
00091                 // Trunk?
00092                 if( level == 0 ) {
00093                         mLength = trunkLength;
00094                         mRadius = mLength * mParameters->getRatio() * ( mParameters->getScale0() + getRandom( mParameters->getScale0V() ) );
00095                         mOffset = 0.0f;
00096                 } else {
00097                         mRadius = radius;
00098                         mLength = length;
00099                         mOffset = offset;
00100                 }
00101                 
00102                 // to avoid having empty first block, ie to start from mOrigin
00103                 //localSectionOrigin = Vector3( 0.0f, mLength / mParameters->getCurveRes( level ), 0.0f );
00104                 //currentOrigin -= mOrientation * localSectionOrigin; // wow, it works ;)
00105                 step = Vector3( 0.0f, mLength / mParameters->getCurveRes( level ), 0.0f );
00106 
00107                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i < mParameters->getCurveRes( level ); ++i ) {
00108                         if( !Math::RealEqual( mParameters->getCurveBack( level ), 0.0f ) ) {
00109                                 if( mParameters->getCurveRes( level ) / ( i + 1 ) < 2 )
00110                                         angle = 2.0f * mParameters->getCurve( level ) / mParameters->getCurveRes( level );
00111                                 else
00112                                         angle = 2.0f * mParameters->getCurveBack( level ) / mParameters->getCurveRes( level );
00113                         }
00114                         else
00115                                 angle = mParameters->getCurve( level ) / mParameters->getCurveRes( level );
00116                         
00117                         angle += getRandom( mParameters->getCurveV( level ) / mParameters->getCurveRes( level ) );
00118                         
00119                         // Calculate vertical attraction
00120                         if( level > 1 && !mIsRoot ) {
00121                                 float decli = Math::ACos( Vector3( newLocalOrientation * Vector3::UNIT_Y ).y ).valueRadians();
00122                                 float orien = Math::ACos( Vector3( newLocalOrientation * Vector3::UNIT_Z ).y ).valueRadians();
00123                                 // No idea why Weber & Penn used acos and then cos ?!
00124                                 angle += mParameters->getAttractionUp() * decli * Math::Cos( orien ) / mParameters->getCurveRes( level );
00125                         }
00126 
00127                         angle = Math::DegreesToRadians( angle );
00128                         localOrientation.FromAngleAxis( Radian( angle ), Vector3::UNIT_X );
00129                         localOrientation = newLocalOrientation * localOrientation;
00130                         
00131                         y = mLength * ( ( float ) i /  mParameters->getCurveRes( level ) );
00132                         sectionRadius = mRadius * ( 1.0f - Math::Pow( y / mLength, 2 ) );
00133                         
00134                         // flaring
00135                         if( level == 0 ) {
00136                                 float y2 = 1.0f - 8.0f * ( ( float ) i /  mParameters->getCurveRes( level ) );
00137                                 if( y2 < 0.0f )
00138                                         y2 = 0.0f;
00139                                 sectionRadius *= 1.0f + mParameters->getFlare() * ( Math::Pow( 100, y2 ) - 1.0f ) * 0.01f;
00140                         }
00141 
00142                         section = new Section;
00143                         section->setOrientation( localOrientation );
00144                         section->setOrigin( localSectionOrigin );
00145                         section->setGlobalOrigin( currentOrigin );
00146                         section->setTexVCoord( ( float ) 0.1f * mLength * i / mParameters->getCurveRes( level ) );
00147 
00148                         if( level == 0 ) // lobbed?
00149                                 section->create( mParameters->getNumLobes(), mParameters->getLobeDepth(), sectionRadius, mParameters->getNumVertices( level ) );
00150                         else
00151                                 section->create( 0, 0.0f, sectionRadius, mParameters->getNumVertices( level ) );
00152 
00153                         mSections.push_back( section );
00154                         
00155                         newLocalOrientation = localOrientation;
00156                         currentOrigin += localOrientation * step;
00157                 }
00158                 mEndVertex = currentOrigin + localOrientation * localSectionOrigin;
00159 
00160                 // Situate and spawn substems if this is not a root stem
00161                 if( !mIsRoot )
00162                         growChildren( level );
00163 
00164                 // Situate leaves and fronds
00165                 if( level == mParameters->getNumLevels() - 1 && !mIsRoot ) {
00166                         growLeaves( level );
00167                         growFronds( level );
00168                 }
00169 
00170                 // this is a trunk stem => grow roots
00171                 if( level == 0 )
00172                         growRoots();
00173 
00174                 mIsGrown = true;
00175         }
00176 
00177         void Stem::growChildren( unsigned char level ) {
00178                 if( level > mParameters->getNumLevels() )
00179                         return;
00180 
00181                 Quaternion rotQuat = Quaternion::IDENTITY;
00182                 Quaternion downQuat = Quaternion::IDENTITY;
00183                 Section* currentSection = 0;
00184                 Vector3 stemOrigin = Vector3::ZERO;
00185                 float rotate = getRandom( Math::PI );
00186                 float downAngle = 0.0f;
00187                 float treeScale = mParameters->getScale() + getRandom( mParameters->getScaleV() );
00188                 float baseLength = mParameters->getBaseSize() * treeScale;
00189                 float lengthChildMax = mParameters->getLength( level + 1 ) + getRandom( mParameters->getLengthV( level + 1 ) );
00190                 float offset = 0.0f;
00191                 float length = 1.0f;
00192                 float radius = 1.0f;
00193 
00194                 if( level == 0 )
00195                         mNumSubStems = mParameters->getNumBranches( level + 1 );
00196                 else if( level == 1 )
00197                         mNumSubStems = ( unsigned int ) mParameters->getNumBranches( level + 1 ) * ( 0.2f + 0.8f * ( mLength / mParent->mLength ) / lengthChildMax );
00198                 else
00199                         mNumSubStems = ( unsigned int ) mParameters->getNumBranches( level + 1 ) * ( 1.0f - 0.5f * ( mOffset / mParent->mLength ) );
00200 
00201                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i < mNumSubStems; ++i ) {
00202                         if( level == 0 )
00203                                 offset = mLength * ( mParameters->getBaseSize() + ( ( i + 1 ) * ( 1.0f - mParameters->getBaseSize() ) / ( mNumSubStems + 1 ) ) );
00204                         else
00205                                 offset = mLength * ( ( float ) ( i + 1 )  / ( mNumSubStems + 1 ) );
00206 
00207                         currentSection = findSection( offset / mLength, mParameters->getCurveRes( level ) );
00208                         
00209                         if( level == 0 )
00210                                 length = mLength * lengthChildMax * shapeRatio( mParameters->getShape(), ( mLength - offset ) / ( mLength - ( treeScale * mParameters->getBaseSize() ) ) );
00211                         else
00212                                 length = lengthChildMax * ( mLength - 0.6f * offset );
00213 
00214                         radius = mRadius * Math::Pow( ( length / mLength ), mParameters->getRatioPower() );
00215                         
00216                         // Down angle
00217                         if( mParameters->getDownAngleV( level + 1 ) >= 0.0f )
00218                                 downAngle = Math::DegreesToRadians( mParameters->getDownAngle( level + 1 ) + getRandom( mParameters->getDownAngleV( level + 1 ) ) );
00219                         else {
00220                                 float temp = ( level == 0 ) ? mLength - baseLength : mLength;
00221                                 downAngle = Math::DegreesToRadians( mParameters->getDownAngle( level + 1 ) + getRandom( mParameters->getDownAngleV( level + 1 ) * ( 1.0f - 2.0f * shapeRatio( CONICAL, ( mLength - offset ) / temp ) ) ) );
00222                         }
00223                         downQuat.FromAngleAxis( Radian( downAngle ), Vector3::UNIT_X );
00224 
00225                         // Rotate angle
00226                         if( mParameters->getRotate( level + 1 ) > 0.0f )
00227                                 rotate += Math::DegreesToRadians( mParameters->getRotate( level + 1 ) + getRandom( mParameters->getRotateV( level + 1 ) ) );
00228                         else
00229                                 rotate += Math::DegreesToRadians( 180.0f + mParameters->getRotate( level + 1 ) + getRandom( mParameters->getRotateV( level + 1 ) ) );
00230 
00231                         if( rotate > Math::TWO_PI )
00232                                 rotate -= Math::TWO_PI;
00233 
00234                         rotQuat.FromAngleAxis( Radian( rotate ), Vector3::UNIT_Y );
00235 
00236 
00237                         stemOrigin = currentSection->getOrientation()
00238                                 * Vector3( 0.0f, offset - findSectionIndex( offset / mLength, mParameters->getCurveRes( level ) ) * mLength / mParameters->getCurveRes( level ), 0.0f )
00239                                 + currentSection->getGlobalOrigin();
00240 
00241                         // spawn
00242                         Stem* child = new Stem( mParameters, this );
00243                         mSubStems.push_back( child );
00244                         child->grow( currentSection->getOrientation() * rotQuat * downQuat, stemOrigin, radius, length, offset, level + 1 );
00245                 }
00246         }
00247 
00248         // TODO - this is almost a copy of growChildren
00249         void Stem::growRoots() {
00250                 Quaternion rotQuat = Quaternion::IDENTITY;
00251                 Quaternion downQuat = Quaternion::IDENTITY;
00252                 Section* currentSection = mSections[0];
00253                 float rotate = getRandom( Math::PI );
00254                 float downAngle = 0.0f;
00255                 float treeScale = mParameters->getScale() + getRandom( mParameters->getScaleV() );
00256                 float baseLength = mParameters->getBaseSize() * treeScale;
00257                 float lengthChildMax = mParameters->getLength( mParameters->getMaxLevels() ) + getRandom( mParameters->getLengthV( mParameters->getMaxLevels() ) );
00258                 float length = 1.0f;
00259                 float radius = 1.0f;
00260 
00261                 unsigned int numRoots = mParameters->getNumBranches( mParameters->getMaxLevels() );
00262                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i < numRoots; ++i ) {
00263                         length = mLength * lengthChildMax;
00264                         radius = 3 * mRadius * Math::Pow( ( length / mLength ), mParameters->getRatioPower() );
00265 
00266                         // Down angle
00267                         if( mParameters->getDownAngleV( mParameters->getMaxLevels() ) >= 0.0f )
00268                                 downAngle = Math::DegreesToRadians( mParameters->getDownAngle( mParameters->getMaxLevels() ) + getRandom( mParameters->getDownAngleV( mParameters->getMaxLevels() ) ) );
00269                         else {
00270                                 float temp = mLength - baseLength;
00271                                 downAngle = Math::DegreesToRadians( mParameters->getDownAngle( mParameters->getMaxLevels() ) + getRandom( mParameters->getDownAngleV( mParameters->getMaxLevels() ) * ( 1.0f - 2.0f * shapeRatio( CONICAL, mLength / temp ) ) ) );
00272                         }
00273                         downQuat.FromAngleAxis( Radian( downAngle ), Vector3::UNIT_X );
00274 
00275                         // Rotate angle
00276                         if( mParameters->getRotate( mParameters->getMaxLevels() ) > 0.0f )
00277                                 rotate += Math::DegreesToRadians( mParameters->getRotate( mParameters->getMaxLevels() ) + getRandom( mParameters->getRotateV( mParameters->getMaxLevels() ) ) );
00278                         else
00279                                 rotate += Math::DegreesToRadians( 180.0f + mParameters->getRotate( mParameters->getMaxLevels() ) + getRandom( mParameters->getRotateV( mParameters->getMaxLevels() ) ) );
00280 
00281                         if( rotate > Math::TWO_PI )
00282                                 rotate -= Math::TWO_PI;
00283 
00284                         rotQuat.FromAngleAxis( Radian( rotate ), Vector3::UNIT_Y );
00285 
00286                         // spawn
00287                         Stem* child = new Stem( mParameters, this );
00288                         child->mIsRoot = true;
00289                         mSubStems.push_back( child );
00290                         child->grow( currentSection->getOrientation() * rotQuat * downQuat, mOrigin, radius, length, 0.0f, mParameters->getMaxLevels() );
00291                 }
00292         }
00293 
00294         void Stem::growLeaves( unsigned char level ) {
00295                 float offset = 0.0f;
00296                 Section* currentSection = 0;
00297                 Vector3 leafPosition = Vector3::ZERO;
00298 
00299                 float randomX = 0.0f;
00300                 float randomZ = 0.0f;
00301                 
00302                 mNumLeaves = ( unsigned int ) ( mParameters->getNumLeaves() * mParameters->getLeafQuality() * shapeRatio( TAPERED_CYLINDRICAL, mOffset / mParent->mLength ) );
00303                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i < mNumLeaves; ++i ) {
00304                         if( level == 0 )
00305                                 offset = mLength * ( mParameters->getBaseSize() + ( ( i + 1 ) * ( 1.0f - mParameters->getBaseSize() ) / ( mNumLeaves + 1 ) ) );
00306                         else
00307                                 offset = mLength * ( 1.0f - Math::Pow( ( ( float ) ( i + 1 ) / ( mNumLeaves + 1 ) ), mParameters->getLeafLayoutExp() ) );
00308 
00309                         currentSection = findSection( offset / mLength, mParameters->getCurveRes( level ) );
00310 
00311                         randomX = getRandom( mParameters->getScale() * 0.04f );
00312                         randomZ = getRandom( mParameters->getScale() * 0.04f );
00313 
00314                         leafPosition = currentSection->getOrientation()
00315                                 * Vector3( randomX, offset - findSectionIndex( offset / mLength, mParameters->getCurveRes( level ) ) * mLength / ( mParameters->getCurveRes( level ) ), randomZ )
00316                                 + currentSection->getGlobalOrigin();
00317 
00318                         mLeaves.push_back( leafPosition );
00319                         mLeafShades.push_back( offset / mLength );
00320                 }
00321         }
00322 
00323         void Stem::growFronds( unsigned char level ) {
00324                 float offset = 0.0f;
00325                 float x = 0.0f, y = 0.0f, z = 0.0f;
00326                 Section* currentSection = 0;
00327                 Vector3 frondPosition = Vector3::ZERO;
00328                 Vector3 frondNormal = Vector3::ZERO;
00329                 Vector3 frondBinormal = Vector3::ZERO;
00330                 unsigned int sectionNumVertices = 0;
00331                 unsigned int sectionVertexIndex = 0;
00332 
00333                 Vector3 temp = Vector3::ZERO;
00334 
00335                 mNumFronds = ( unsigned int ) ( mParameters->getNumFronds() * mParameters->getFrondQuality() * shapeRatio( TAPERED_CYLINDRICAL, mOffset / mParent->mLength ) );
00336                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i < mNumFronds; ++i ) {
00337                         if( level == 0 )
00338                                 offset = mLength * ( mParameters->getBaseSize() + ( ( i + 1 ) * ( 1.0f - mParameters->getBaseSize() ) / ( mNumFronds + 1 ) ) );
00339                         else
00340                                 offset = mLength * ( ( float ) ( i + 1 ) / ( mNumFronds + 1 ) );
00341 
00342                         currentSection = findSection( offset / mLength, mParameters->getCurveRes( level ) );
00343 
00344                         sectionNumVertices = ( unsigned int ) currentSection->getGlobalVertices()->size();
00345                         sectionVertexIndex = ( unsigned int ) Math::RangeRandom( 0.0f, ( float ) sectionNumVertices );
00346                         
00347                         frondPosition = ( *( currentSection->getGlobalVertices() ) )[ sectionVertexIndex ];
00348                         frondNormal = ( *( currentSection->getNormals() ) )[ sectionVertexIndex ];
00349 
00350                         y = getRandom( 1.0f );
00351                         z = getRandom( 1.0f );
00352                         x = ( -1.0f ) * ( y * frondNormal.y + z * frondNormal.z ) / frondNormal.x;
00353                         
00354                         frondBinormal = Vector3( x, y, z ).normalisedCopy();
00355                         
00356                         temp = frondPosition + 0.5f * mParameters->getFrondScale() * mParameters->getFrondScaleX() * frondBinormal;
00357                         mFronds.push_back( temp );
00358                         temp = temp + mParameters->getFrondScale() * frondNormal;
00359                         mFronds.push_back( temp );
00360                         temp = temp - mParameters->getFrondScale() * mParameters->getFrondScaleX() * frondBinormal;
00361                         mFronds.push_back( temp );
00362                         temp = frondPosition - 0.5f * mParameters->getFrondScale() * mParameters->getFrondScaleX() * frondBinormal;
00363                         mFronds.push_back( temp );
00364 
00365                         // temporarily faked normals
00366                         mFrondNormals.push_back( Vector3( 1.0, -1.0, 0.0 ).normalisedCopy() );
00367                         mFrondNormals.push_back( Vector3( 1.0, 1.0, 0.0 ).normalisedCopy() );
00368                         mFrondNormals.push_back( Vector3( -1.0, 1.0, 0.0 ).normalisedCopy() );
00369                         mFrondNormals.push_back( Vector3( -1.0, -1.0, 0.0 ).normalisedCopy() );
00370                 }
00371         }
00372 
00373         void Stem::createGeometry( ManualObject* geom ) {
00374                 if( !mIsGrown )
00375                         throw Exception( Exception::ERR_INTERNAL_ERROR, "You should first call grow()", "Stem::createGeometry" );
00376                 
00377                 if( !geom )
00378                         throw Exception( Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "ManualObject* geom == NULL", "Stem::createGeometry" );
00379 
00380                 if( !mParameters )
00381                         throw Exception( Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "Parameters* mParameters == NULL", "Stem::createGeometry" );
00382                 
00383                 geom->begin( mParameters->getBarkMaterial(), RenderOperation::OT_TRIANGLE_LIST );
00384 
00385                 std::vector< float >* coords = 0;
00386                 std::vector< Vector3 >* vertices = 0;
00387 
00388                 unsigned int endIndex = 0;
00389                 unsigned int lastSectionIndex = 0;
00390 
00391                 // vertices
00392                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i < mSections.size(); ++i ) {
00393                         for( unsigned int j = 0; j < mSections[ i ]->getGlobalVertices()->size(); ++j ) {
00394                                 geom->position( ( *( mSections[ i ]->getGlobalVertices() ) )[ j ] );
00395                                 geom->normal( ( *( mSections[ i ]->getNormals() ) )[ j ] );
00396                                 geom->textureCoord( 6 * mRadius * ( *( mSections[ i ]->getTexUCoords() ) )[ j ], 4*mSections[ i ]->getTexVCoord() );
00397                                 ++endIndex;
00398                                 ++mNumVertices;
00399                         }
00400                 }
00401                 geom->position( mEndVertex );
00402                 geom->normal( mEndVertex.normalisedCopy() );
00403                 geom->textureCoord( 0.5f, 0.4f * mLength ); // Remember that you scale UVs manually in code here and above
00404                 ++mNumVertices;
00405 
00406                 // indices
00407                 unsigned int i = 0;
00408                 unsigned int j = 0;
00409                 for( i = 0; i < mSections.size() - 1; ++i ) {
00410                         for( j = 0; j < mSections[ i ]->getGlobalVertices()->size() - 1; ++j ) {
00411                                 geom->index( ( uint16 ) ( j + ( i + 1 ) * mSections[ i ]->getGlobalVertices()->size() ) );
00412                                 geom->index( ( uint16 ) ( j + 1 + i * mSections[ i ]->getGlobalVertices()->size() ) );
00413                                 geom->index( ( uint16 ) ( j + i * mSections[ i ]->getGlobalVertices()->size() ) );
00414                                 ++mNumTriangles;
00415                                 
00416                                 geom->index( ( uint16 ) ( j + ( i + 1 ) * mSections[ i ]->getGlobalVertices()->size() ) );
00417                                 geom->index( ( uint16 ) ( j + 1 + ( i + 1 ) * mSections[ i ]->getGlobalVertices()->size() ) );
00418                                 geom->index( ( uint16 ) ( j + 1 + i * mSections[ i ]->getGlobalVertices()->size() ) );
00419                                 ++mNumTriangles;
00420                         }
00421                 }
00422 
00423                 // end point
00424                 lastSectionIndex = endIndex - mSections[ mSections.size() - 1 ]->getGlobalVertices()->size();
00425                 for( unsigned int k = 0; k < mSections[ mSections.size() - 1 ]->getGlobalVertices()->size() - 1; ++k ) {
00426                         geom->index( ( uint16 ) ( endIndex ) );
00427                         geom->index( ( uint16 ) ( k + lastSectionIndex + 1 ) );
00428                         geom->index( ( uint16 ) ( k + lastSectionIndex ) );
00429                         ++mNumTriangles;
00430                 }
00431 
00432                 geom->end();
00433 
00434                 // tell children to do the same
00435                 std::list< Stem* >::iterator it;
00436                 for( it = mSubStems.begin(); it != mSubStems.end(); ++it ) {
00437                         if( *it ) ( *it )->createGeometry( geom );
00438                 }
00439 
00440                 // add fronds
00441                 if( mFronds.size() > 0 ) {
00442                         geom->begin( mParameters->getFrondMaterial(), RenderOperation::OT_TRIANGLE_LIST );
00443                         // vertices
00444                         for( unsigned int i = 0; i < mFronds.size(); i += 4 ) { // new frond starts every 4 vertices
00445                                 geom->position( mFronds[ i ] );
00446                                 geom->normal( mFrondNormals[ i ] );
00447                                 geom->textureCoord( 0.0f, 1.0f );
00448                                 geom->position( mFronds[ i + 1 ] );
00449                                 geom->normal( mFrondNormals[ i + 1 ] );
00450                                 geom->textureCoord( 0.0f, 0.0f );
00451                                 geom->position( mFronds[ i + 2 ] );
00452                                 geom->normal( mFrondNormals[ i + 2 ] );
00453                                 geom->textureCoord( 1.0f, 0.0f );
00454                                 geom->position( mFronds[ i + 3 ] );
00455                                 geom->normal( mFrondNormals[ i + 3 ] );
00456                                 geom->textureCoord( 1.0f, 1.0f );
00457                         }
00458                         // indices
00459                         for( unsigned int i = 0; i < mFronds.size(); i += 4 ) {
00460                                 geom->index( ( uint16 ) i );
00461                                 geom->index( ( uint16 ) i + 1 );
00462                                 geom->index( ( uint16 ) i + 2 );
00463 
00464                                 geom->index( ( uint16 ) i + 3 );
00465                                 geom->index( ( uint16 ) i );
00466                                 geom->index( ( uint16 ) i + 2 );
00467                         }
00468                         geom->end();
00469                 }
00470         }
00471 
00472         void Stem::createLeaves( BillboardSet* set ) {
00473                 if( !mIsGrown )
00474                         throw Exception( Exception::ERR_INTERNAL_ERROR, "You should first call grow()", "Stem::createGeometry" );
00475 
00476                 if( !set )
00477                         throw Exception( Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "BillboardSet* set == NULL", "Stem::createGeometry" );
00478 
00479                 if( !mParameters )
00480                         throw Exception( Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "Parameters* mParameters == NULL", "Stem::createGeometry" );
00481 
00482                 set->setMaterialName( mParameters->getLeafMaterial() );
00483                 set->setDefaultDimensions( mParameters->getLeafScale() * mParameters->getLeafScaleX() / Math::Sqrt( mParameters->getLeafQuality() ), mParameters->getLeafScale() / Math::Sqrt( mParameters->getLeafQuality() ) );
00484                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i < mLeaves.size(); ++i ) {
00485                         set->createBillboard( mLeaves[ i ] )->setColour( ColourValue( mLeafShades[ i ], mLeafShades[ i ], mLeafShades[ i ] ) );
00486                 }
00487                                 
00488                 // tell children to do the same
00489                 std::list< Stem* >::iterator it;
00490                 for( it = mSubStems.begin(); it != mSubStems.end(); ++it ) {
00491                         if( *it ) ( *it )->createLeaves( set );
00492                 }
00493         }
00494 
00495         Section* Stem::findSection( float fractionalPosition, unsigned int curveRes ) {
00496                 if( fractionalPosition < 0.0f || fractionalPosition > 1.0f )
00497                         return 0;
00498 
00499                 Section* currentSection = *mSections.begin();
00500                 // empty list?
00501                 if( currentSection == 0 || mSections.size() == 0 )
00502                         return 0;
00503 
00504                 unsigned int index = ( unsigned int ) ( fractionalPosition * curveRes );
00505 
00506                 std::vector< Section* >::iterator it = mSections.begin();
00507                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i < index; ++i )
00508                         ++it;
00509 
00510                 currentSection = *it;
00511 
00512                 return currentSection;
00513         }
00514 
00515         unsigned int Stem::findSectionIndex( float fractionalPosition, unsigned int curveRes ) {
00516                 if( fractionalPosition < 0.0f || fractionalPosition > 1.0f )
00517                         return -1;
00518 
00519                 if( *mSections.begin() == 0 )
00520                         return -1;
00521 
00522                 return ( unsigned int ) ( fractionalPosition * curveRes );
00523         }
00524 
00525         float Stem::shapeRatio( ShapeEnum shape, float ratio ) {
00526                 float result = 0.0f;
00527                 switch( shape ) {
00528                         case CONICAL:
00529                                 result = 0.2f + 0.8f * ratio;
00530                                 break;
00531                         case SPHERICAL:
00532                                 result = 0.2f + 0.8f * Math::Sin( ratio * Math::PI );
00533                                 break;
00534                         case HEMISPHERICAL:
00535                                 result = 0.2f + 0.8f * Math::Sin( 0.5f * ratio * Math::PI );
00536                                 break;
00537                         case CYLINDRICAL:
00538                                 result = 1.0f;
00539                                 break;
00540                         case TAPERED_CYLINDRICAL:
00541                                 result = 0.5 + 0.5 * ratio;
00542                                 break;
00543                         case FLAME:
00544                                 result = ( ratio > 0.7f ) ? ( 3.33333f * ( 1.0f - ratio ) ) : ( ratio * 1.428571f );
00545                                 break;
00546                         case INVERSE_CONICAL:
00547                                 result = 1.0f - 0.8f * ratio;
00548                                 break;
00549                         case TEND_FLAME:
00550                                 result = ( ratio > 0.7f ) ? ( 0.5f + 1.6666667f * ( 1.0f - ratio ) ) : ( 0.5f + ratio * 0.714285f );
00551                                 break;
00552                         default:
00553                                 break;
00554                 }
00555                 return result;
00556         }
00557 
00558         float Stem::getRandom( float bound ) {
00559                 if( Math::RealEqual( bound, 0.0f ) )
00560                         return 0.0f;
00561                 
00562                 if( bound > 0.0f )
00563                         return Math::RangeRandom( -bound, bound );
00564 
00565                 return Math::RangeRandom( bound, -bound );
00566         }
00567 
00568         unsigned int Stem::getNumVerticesChildren() {
00569                 unsigned int count = 0;
00570                 for( std::list< Stem* >::iterator it = mSubStems.begin(); it != mSubStems.end(); ++it ) {
00571                         count += ( *it )->getNumVerticesChildren();
00572                 }
00573                 return mNumVertices + count;
00574         }
00575 
00576         unsigned int Stem::getNumTrianglesChildren() {
00577                 unsigned int count = 0;
00578                 for( std::list< Stem* >::iterator it = mSubStems.begin(); it != mSubStems.end(); ++it ) {
00579                         count += ( *it )->getNumTrianglesChildren();
00580                 }
00581                 return mNumTriangles + count;
00582         }
